content: ***this pattern is also available to view for free on my website you can purchase an ad-free pdf version formated for printing here in my shop *** elevate your fall decor with these easy-to-make chunky crochet pumpkins this free crochet pattern comes in 3 sizes so you can choose which ones fit your space the best elevate your fall decor with these easy-to-make chunky crochet pumpkins this free crochet pattern comes in 3 sizes so you can choose which ones fit your space the best small 3 in tall x 5 in wide medium 4 in tall x 7 in wide large 5 in tall x 9 in wide
